Cherrycake\Image::getHeight

getHeight

    Signature

    public function getHeight([boolean $sizeName = false, [boolean $isHd = false]] )

    Parameters

    $sizeName — boolean
    If the image has sizes, the size for which to get the height for
    $isHd — boolean
    Whether to use the high density version of the image if available, or not. Defaults to false.

    Returns

    integer
    The height of the image in pixels
